snippet.textDisplay: Thanks for sharing about the situation here in Shanghai. It’s incredibly tough for most of us but we are keeping a positive attitude and hope things will be “normal” soon.
snippet.textOriginal: Thanks for sharing about the situation here in Shanghai. It’s incredibly tough for most of us but we are keeping a positive attitude and hope things will be “normal” soon.

snippet.textDisplay: Summon a mass prayer ritual. I'd love to switch places with you. Quarantines, restrictions, and isolation mean nothing to me after I had an epiphany that I didn't even survive the first round. And a corpse can't really die twice so I don't mind being a hostage.
